description: Kuzuha Kirika is the Superintendent of http://anidb.net/ch16459 [Hakuou Academy] who first appears asking http://anidb.net/ch623 [Yukiji] to tell http://anidb.net/ch532 [Hayate] that he had failed the entrance exam, but it is only in the anime that her character was developed. In the anime, she possesses a power level three times that of an ordinary person, but the moment she uses all her energy, she drops to the floor. She tends to do extreme things to kill her boredom.
name: Kuzuha Kirika
